title: . directory is still too special for publish -- does not copy data if I publish '.'
body:
First detected while working in a subdirectory and wanted to upload all of its data
I thought we went away from that annotation but apparently not -- it seems to upload data fine if I point to some subdir, but not when '.' 

This was the case with previous master and now with all the goodness merged (7dc1708193c1ea50d0fdedd346a6de907b0ba4d0)

```shell
$> echo 125 > d/125; datalad add d                   
add(ok): /tmp/ds1/d/125 (file)                                                                                                                                                                                                    
add(ok): /tmp/ds1/d (directory)
save(ok): /tmp/ds1 (dataset)
action summary:
  add (ok: 2)
  save (ok: 1)
(dev) 2 10796.....................................:Thu 17 Aug 2017 10:54:58 AM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/ds1[master]
$> datalad publish --to=localhost d                  
        added(file): d/125         
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/tmp/ds1> data to localhost 
publish(ok): /tmp/ds1/d/125 (file)                                                                                                                                                                                                
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/tmp/ds1> to localhost                                                                                                                                                                         
publish(ok): /tmp/ds1 (dataset) [pushed to localhost: ['0096bef..ce10fe4', 'e3c877c..ce03350']]
action summary:
  publish (ok: 2)
(dev) 2 10797.....................................:Thu 17 Aug 2017 10:55:06 AM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/ds1[master]
$> echo 126 > 126; datalad add 126 
add(ok): /tmp/ds1/126 (file)                                                                                                                                                                                                      
save(ok): /tmp/ds1 (dataset)
action summary:
  add (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
(dev) 2 10798.....................................:Thu 17 Aug 2017 10:55:25 AM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/ds1[master]
$> datalad publish --to=localhost .
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/tmp/ds1> to localhost 
publish(ok): /tmp/ds1 (dataset) [pushed to localhost: ['ce10fe4..7af94cb', 'ce03350..5417895']]
(dev) 2 10799.....................................:Thu 17 Aug 2017 10:55:33 AM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/ds1[master]
$> datalad publish --to=localhost $PWD
publish(notneeded): /tmp/ds1 (dataset)
(dev) 2 10800.....................................:Thu 17 Aug 2017 10:56:17 AM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/ds1[master]
$> datalad publish --to=localhost 126 
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/tmp/ds1> data to localhost 
publish(ok): /tmp/ds1/126 (file)                                                                                                                                                                                                  
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/tmp/ds1> to localhost                                                                                                                                                                         
publish(ok): /tmp/ds1 (dataset) [pushed to localhost: ['[up to date]', '3c3cd56..e31ed6a']]
action summary:
  publish (ok: 2)

```
